description: You will always have a mask on covering your emotions. They don't need to know unless you want them to know.
You keep your heels, head and standards high but middle finger even higher.
Behind your fake smile there is everything they'll never understand.
You like to be strong for everybody but only wants for that one person to be strong for you at the end of the day.
Almost everyone who meets you likes you. You have a way of making others feel comfortable with you.
You are a true ride or die partner because no one else can love others better or treat them right like you can.
You aren't always known for being strong but you put up a lot of stuff most other's would run from.
Things that irritate you: “People that withdraw affection or communication for no reason and people taking your kindness for weakness.”
Your thoughts: “You thought I forgot because I kept mute about the situation?...   Think again!”
It takes you 2.5 seconds to go from this is the best day ever to wanting to punch other right in the face
You may seem innocent but let anyone piss you off and they will watch the devil come out of you.
Nobody can fool you but you let them think they have for a moment.
You have the will power to survive in any condition.
If anyone is a special person to you, you would rather see them happy than yourself. And ony those who are close to you will understand this sacrificial part of you.
Many people may often underestimate how loyal you are because of fire and spontaneous you are. But this is not the case. You are extremely loyal friend.
You can make bold and risky choices to win the game. Fortunateky, you can bring your A game on every time!
You love to be number one, so it’s no surprise that these audacious rams are so well-mannered. Bold and ambitious, dives headfirst into even the most challenging situations.
You are so loving but often forget to love yourself first.
You know instantly if something's wrong or someone is lying.
You have a dark side that counteracts your loving side.
